data.eml:eml: Anacroneuria (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from the Mantiqueira Mountains, São Paulo State, Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Froehlich, Claudio G. (2010): Anacroneuria (Plecoptera, Perlidae) from the Mantiqueira Mountains, São Paulo State, Brazil. Zootaxa 2365: 55-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275765
